{"id":407311025,"lang":"cpp","time":"9Â months, 2Â weeks","timestamp":1602410892,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/407311025/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"6.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x) {\n         if(x>=INT_MAX || x<=INT_MIN) return 0;\n        bool isNegative=false;\n        if(x<0) { isNegative=true; x*=-1;}\n        int lenNo=0;\n        int y=x;\n        while(y>0){\n            y/=10;\n            lenNo++;\n        }\n        lenNo--;\n        long long int ans=0;\n        long long int pw=pow(10,lenNo);\n        while(x>0){\n            int last_digit=x%10;\n            ans+=(pw * last_digit);\n            pw/=10;\n            x/=10;\n        }\n        if(ans>=INT_MAX) return 0;\n        if(isNegative) return -1*ans;\n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer"}
